                    throws java.io.IOException

        This function is called when "back" button is pressed.

      • signIn

        public void signIn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Prepare request and send request to server for log in as a given user

        Function gathers username and password from signInUsername and signInPassword, prepares message then send it using user property. If successful active user is changed and pop up is generated. Otherwise an error message shows up.

        Parameters:
        event -

      • signUp

        public void signUp(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Prepare request and send request to server for create user account

        Function gathers information about new user from FXML properties, prepares message then send it using user property. If successful new account is created, active user is changed and pop up is generated. Otherwise an error message shows up. Passwords must be matching in both FXML passwords fields.

        Parameters:
        event -
